message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE

The paper discusses a new generation hybrid botnet that covertly communicates over Bitcoin Lightning Network (LN), which involves network security (cs.CR) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the design and implementation of the botnet, which falls under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses potential countermeasures to detect and take down the botnet, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE).
